properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: CopyAFile
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: DeleteAFile
activities.description: Delete a file from the source store

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

properties.description: It describes the file in the data source store.
It describes the folder in the data source store.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Calls as (SequenceNumber as string, JourneyPatternPointRef as string, IsTimingPoint as boolean, DepartureTimetabledEarliestDateTime as string, ArrivalTimetabledLatestDateTime as string)[],
		JourneyNumber as string,
		OriginName as string,
		PrimaryDestinationName as string,
		SecondaryDestinationName as string,
		SecondaryDestinationType as string,
		TransportMode as string,
		ContractorOrganizationId as string,
		TimetabledStartDateTime as string,
		TimetabledEndDateTime as string,
		LineRef as string,
		DirectionOfLineRef as string,
		JourneyPatternRef as string,
		AdvanceOrderCondition as string,
		JourneyCreationParameters as string,
		JourneyRef as (ObjectRef as string, OperatingDayDate as string),
		TimeStamps as (TimeStamp as string, Name as string)[],
		partitionKey as string,
		LastModifiedDateTime as string,
		ttl as string,
		id as string,
		Type as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceJson
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		Calls,
		JourneyNumber,
		OriginName,
		PrimaryDestinationName,
		SecondaryDestinationName,
		SecondaryDestinationType,
		TransportMode,
		ContractorOrganizationId,
		TimetabledStartDateTime,
		TimetabledEndDateTime,
		LineRef,
		DirectionOfLineRef,
		JourneyPatternRef,
		AdvanceOrderCondition,
		JourneyCreationParameters,
		JourneyRef,
		TimeStamps,
		partitionKey,
		LastModifiedDateTime,
		ttl,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable]
(
	[VendorID]
	,[tpep_pickup_datetime]
,[tpep_dropoff_datetime]
,[passenger_count]
,[trip_distance]
,[RatecodeID]
,[store_and_fwd_flag]
,[PULocationID]
,[DOLocationID]
,[payment_type]
,[fare_amount]
,[extra]
,[mta_tax]
,[tip_amount]
,[tolls_amount]
,[improvement_surcharge]
,[total_amount]
,[congestion_surcharge]
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/folder/file',
	DATA_SOURCE = [DataSource1],
	FILE_FORMAT = [FileFormat1]
)

WITH rides AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
                'Account=hankycosmos;Database=vehiclejourneysdomain;Key=5I1dKBnvbWDXOdCaeD9LMV6VcVF1Jx5be3qrdV9waBIbwgcO3Pa8lHkTlypL8re54ElmxN3VsOkONSVKKO2Qbw==',
                [265581f3-17e5-4d58-bba1-a97b00dfcf96])
                AS [MyRides]
),
MonitoredVehicleJourneys AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
                'Account=hankycosmos;Database=Hogia;Key=5I1dKBnvbWDXOdCaeD9LMV6VcVF1Jx5be3qrdV9waBIbwgcO3Pa8lHkTlypL8re54ElmxN3VsOkONSVKKO2Qbw==',
                MonitoredVehicleJourneys)
                AS [MyMonitoredVehicleJourneys]
                WHERE PartitionKey ='265581f3-17e5-4d58-bba1-a97b00dfcf96:9015012000800158:2021-02-11' 
               
)
SELECT
*
FROM rides r
LEFT JOIN MonitoredVehicleJourneys MVJ on r.PartitionKey = MVJ.PartitionKey
--ORDER BY current_day ASC

Create Schema SalesLT;
GO


CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Customer] ([CustomerID] Int NOT NULL
,[NameStyle] Bit NOT NULL
,[Title] NVarchar(8) NULL
,[FirstName] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[MiddleName] NVarchar(50) NULL
,[LastName] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[Suffix] NVarchar(10) NULL
,[CompanyName] NVarchar(128) NULL
,[SalesPerson] NVarchar(256) NULL
,[EmailAddress] NVarchar(50) NULL
,[Phone] NVarchar(25) NULL
,[PasswordHash] VarChar(128) NOT NULL
,[PasswordSalt] VarChar(10) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductModel] ([ProductModelID] Int NOT NULL
,[Name] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductDescription] ([ProductDescriptionID] Int NOT NULL
,[Description] NVarchar(400) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Product] ([ProductID] Int NOT NULL
,[Name] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[ProductNumber] NVarchar(25) NOT NULL
,[Color] NVarchar(15) NULL
,[StandardCost] Money NOT NULL
,[ListPrice] Money NOT NULL
,[Size] NVarchar(5) NULL
,[Weight] Decimal(8,2) NULL
,[ProductCategoryID] Int NULL
,[ProductModelID] Int NULL
,[SellStartDate] DateTime NOT NULL
,[SellEndDate] DateTime NULL
,[DiscontinuedDate] DateTime NULL
,[ThumbNailPhoto] Varbinary(8000) NULL
,[ThumbnailPhotoFileName] NVarchar(50) NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductModelProductDescription] ([ProductModelID] Int NOT NULL
,[ProductDescriptionID] Int NOT NULL
,[Culture] NChar(6) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductCategory] ([ProductCategoryID] Int NOT NULL
,[ParentProductCategoryID] Int NULL
,[Name] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Address] ([AddressID] Int NOT NULL
,[AddressLine1] NVarchar(60) NOT NULL
,[AddressLine2] NVarchar(60) NULL
,[City] NVarchar(30) NOT NULL
,[StateProvince] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[CountryRegion] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[PostalCode] NVarchar(15) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] ([CustomerID] Int NOT NULL
,[AddressID] Int NOT NULL
,[AddressType] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] ([SalesOrderID] Int NOT NULL
,[SalesOrderDetailID] Int NOT NULL
,[OrderQty] SmallInt NOT NULL
,[ProductID] Int NOT NULL
,[UnitPrice] Money NOT NULL
,[UnitPriceDiscount] Money NOT NULL
,[LineTotal] Decimal(38,6) NOT NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = HASH([SalesOrderID]))

CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] ([SalesOrderID] Int NOT NULL
,[RevisionNumber] TinyInt NOT NULL
,[OrderDate] DateTime NOT NULL
,[DueDate] DateTime NOT NULL
,[ShipDate] DateTime NULL
,[Status] TinyInt NOT NULL
,[OnlineOrderFlag] Bit NOT NULL
,[SalesOrderNumber] NVarchar(25) NOT NULL
,[PurchaseOrderNumber] NVarchar(25) NULL
,[AccountNumber] NVarchar(15) NULL
,[CustomerID] Int NOT NULL
,[ShipToAddressID] Int NULL
,[BillToAddressID] Int NULL
,[ShipMethod] NVarchar(50) NOT NULL
,[CreditCardApprovalCode] VarChar(15) NULL
,[SubTotal] Money NOT NULL
,[TaxAmt] Money NOT NULL
,[Freight] Money NOT NULL
,[TotalDue] Money NOT NULL
,[Comment] NVarchar(4000) NULL
,[rowguid] VarChar(38) NOT NULL
,[ModifiedDate] DateTime NOT NULL
) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN)

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/amsterdam/TaxiData/TaxiData/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT 
		YEAR(pickup_datetime),
		passenger_count,
		COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM  
	OPENROWSET(
		BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/amsterdam/TaxiData/TaxiData/part-00000-cef1404b-3f03-4496-a2a9-9e849189dde1-c000.snappy.parquet', 
		FORMAT='PARQUET'
	) WITH (
		pickup_datetime DATETIME2, 
		passenger_count INT
	) AS nyc
GROUP BY 
	passenger_count,
	YEAR(pickup_datetime)
ORDER BY
	YEAR(pickup_datetime),
	passenger_count















CREATE VIEW ext_2018
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/amsterdam/TaxiData/TaxiData/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE Tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN CAST('12/31/2019' AS datetime) AND CAST('1/1/2021' AS datetime)

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'amsterdam_hankyadlsv2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [amsterdam_hankyadlsv2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://amsterdam@hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE     = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_2020 (
	[VendorID] int,
	[tpep_pickup_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[tpep_dropoff_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[passenger_count] int,
	[trip_distance] numeric(10,2),
	[RatecodeID] int,
	[store_and_fwd_flag] varchar(8000),
	[PULocationID] int,
	[DOLocationID] int,
	[payment_type] int,
	[fare_amount] numeric(10,2),
	[extra] numeric(10,2),
	[mta_tax] numeric(10,2),
	[tip_amount] numeric(10,2),
	[tolls_amount] numeric(10,2),
	[improvement_surcharge] numeric(10,2),
	[total_amount] numeric(10,2),
	[congestion_surcharge] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'TaxiData/Refined_18/part-00000-cef1404b-3f03-4496-a2a9-9e849189dde1-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [amsterdam_hankyadlsv2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext_2020
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
                'Account=hankycosmos;Database=Hogia;Key=5I1dKBnvbWDXOdCaeD9LMV6VcVF1Jx5be3qrdV9waBIbwgcO3Pa8lHkTlypL8re54ElmxN3VsOkONSVKKO2Qbw==',
                MonitoredVehicleJourneys) AS MonitoredVehicleJourneys

SELECT TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
                'Account=hankycosmos;Database=vehiclejourneysdomain;Key=5I1dKBnvbWDXOdCaeD9LMV6VcVF1Jx5be3qrdV9waBIbwgcO3Pa8lHkTlypL8re54ElmxN3VsOkONSVKKO2Qbw==',
                [265581f3-17e5-4d58-bba1-a97b00dfcf96]) AS [265581f3-17e5-4d58-bba1-a97b00dfcf96]



SELECT TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB',
                'Account=hankycosmos;Database=Hogia;Key=5I1dKBnvbWDXOdCaeD9LMV6VcVF1Jx5be3qrdV9waBIbwgcO3Pa8lHkTlypL8re54ElmxN3VsOkONSVKKO2Qbw==',
                MonitoredVehicleJourneys) AS MonitoredVehicleJourneys

source:
# Load a streaming Spark DataFrame from a Cosmos DB container
# To select a preferred list of regions in a multi-region Cosmos DB account, add .option("spark.cosmos.preferredRegions", "<Region1>,<Region2>")

dfStream = spark.readStream\
    .format("cosmos.oltp")\
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", "CosmosDb1")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", "MonitoredVehicleJourneys")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.changeFeed.readEnabled", "true")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.changeFeed.startFromTheBeginning", "true")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.changeFeed.checkpointLocation", "/localReadCheckpointFolder")\
    .option("spark.cosmos.changeFeed.queryName", "streamQuery")\
    .load()
from azure.storage.filedatalake import DataLakeServiceClient, FileSystemClient, DataLakeFileClient
